author: [Anonymous]
text:
I am interested in knowing of any creative approaches to financing ladder vehicles including working with insurance companies. 
If a municipality has sufficient amount and quality of fire vehicle, it should result in better fire safety.  For an insurance company they should be interested in bring down the cost of claims. Have you or anyone you know ever engaged in such a private-public partnership?
title: Public-Private Partnerships to Finance Ladder Vehicles
